segments.text: Good morning , sir . May I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Good morning . I need a new identification card .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK , did you bring your household register or residence booklet ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I only have my household register .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It doesn't matter , they are the same thing .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Here you are , sir . What do I do next ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK , I will register you in our database system . What's your name , please ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Please get a mug shot in the next room .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I've brought with me some of old ones .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: But we need them taken with digital cameras .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's all . Come here a week later and get your ID card .
segments.speaker: S1
